jump_scares.spoiler: During the school play, a door beneath Charlie’s feet opens and he falls through, hanging himself in the process
Ryan pops up in front of the camera
Something smashes on the ground
There is a loud thudding noise
Pfeifer appears suddenly
The TV makes a loud noise and switches from static to an old news clip
Cassidy screams
Ryan sees a mask as he walks through the wardrobe room
A loud noise interrupts an argument between the group
Cassidy is pulled upwards by an unseen force
An unseen force throws Ryan off the ladder
A loud noise can be heard coming from the other side of the door
The camera spins around and focuses on the Hangman, who has appeared suddenly
Ryan’s cellphone drops to the floor as he is pulled up by his neck
A noose appears around Cassidy’s neck and she is pulled away suddenly. [Video]
The Hangman can be seen standing begin Pfeifer
The Hangman lunges at Pfeifer and Reese on the stairs
Ryan’s hanging body suddenly appears in front of the camera
The spotlight turns on suddenly
A policeman enters a bedroom, the camera moves to the bed where Alexis is combing Pfeifer’s hair
A policeman is thrown against a wall, the camera then moves back to Alexis and Pfeifer who are looking at the hangman who then attacks the cameraman
